info: Since I can't put comments here, so i have to tell you Via this array!
showBasicStats (true/false) - if true, it shows Hits, Best Combo, Judgements, and Health
showAdvancedStats (true/false) - if true, it shows Note Average and Notes Per Second
vanillaMode (true/false) - if true, the healthbar, score text, and icon bop will be a remeincent of base FNF
